TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Index extends Microsoft.Azure.Documents.JsonSerializable
Public MustInherit Class Index Inherits JsonSerializable

Docs.summary: Base class for IndexingPolicy Indexes in the Azure Cosmos DB service, you should use a concrete Index like HashIndex or RangeIndex.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.Azure.Documents.HashIndex Hash (Microsoft.Azure.Documents.DataType dataType);
.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Azure.Documents.HashIndex Hash(valuetype Microsoft.Azure.Documents.DataType dataType) cil managed
Public Shared Function Hash (dataType As DataType) As HashIndex
static member Hash : Microsoft.Azure.Documents.DataType -> Microsoft.Azure.Documents.HashIndex

Docs.param: Specifies the target data type for the index path specification.
Docs.summary: Returns an instance of the class with specified DataType for the Azure Cosmos DB service.
Docs.example:
Here is an example to create HashIndex instance passing in the DataType:
HashIndex hashIndex = Index.Hash(DataType.String);

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.Azure.Documents.HashIndex Hash (Microsoft.Azure.Documents.DataType dataType, short precision);

static member Hash : Microsoft.Azure.Documents.DataType * int16 -> Microsoft.Azure.Documents.HashIndex

Docs.param: Specifies the target data type for the index path specification.
Specifies the precision to be used for the data type associated with this index.
Docs.summary: Returns an instance of the class with specified DataType and precision for the Azure Cosmos DB service.
Docs.example:
Here is an example to create HashIndex instance passing in the DataType and precision:
HashIndex hashIndex = Index.Hash(DataType.String, 3);
